name: Hanoi Cooking Class with local people
description:
Get away from
the classical cooking classes and learn the Vietnamese cuisine at a local home.
We will start our day with a short stop at a local market. Here you will browse
hundreds of stalls, and interact with vendors selling everything from garlic to
tapioca flour. Take in all the colors, sights and smells! Hanoi’s markets are
world famous, and you’ll quickly see why.
